trans-unit.source: Represents a field that displays navigation controls in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control enable users to page through data.
trans-unit.target: 表示會顯示在瀏覽控制項的欄位<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref>控制項可讓使用者逐頁查看資料。

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField class represents a field that displays navigation controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousPagerField 類別表示會顯示在瀏覽控制項的欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: These navigation controls can be used to page through data that are displayed by a control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer> interface, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用這些瀏覽控制項來逐頁查看資料實作的控制項所顯示的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer>這類介面<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer>

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField class provides buttons that enable users to navigate through the pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousPagerField 類別會提供按鈕，可讓使用者瀏覽資料的一個頁面的頁面，一次，或是跳到第一個或最後一頁的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of the NextPreviousPagerField object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A> property to set the style of the buttons.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用自訂 NextPreviousPagerField 物件的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>屬性來設定按鈕的樣式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property to choose the type of button that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>選擇會顯示的按鈕類型的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available button types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: |Button type|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.| You can hide a NextPreviousPagerField object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: |按鈕類型 |描述 | |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制項。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制項。 | 您可以隱藏 NextPreviousPagerField 物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>藉由設定控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: You can also hide the individual buttons (the first-page, previous-page, next-page, and last-page buttons) by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以隱藏個別的按鈕 （第一頁、 前一頁、 下一步 頁面上和最後一頁按鈕），藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField control enables you to specify custom text for each button by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousPagerField 控制項可讓您使用指定的每個按鈕的自訂文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must provide the URL to an image that will be displayed for the button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`，您必須提供按鈕將會顯示影像的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set images individually for each button by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定來設定個別為每個按鈕的影像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`，對應的文字屬性做為影像的替代文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the text that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A> property is displayed as the alternate text for the first-page image button.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，由所指定的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>屬性會顯示為第一頁影像按鈕的替代文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 支援的瀏覽器工具提示，此文字也會顯示為工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the NextPreviousPagerField constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用 NextPreviousPagerField 建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: This constructor is typically used when you are adding fields to a dynamically created <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式通常是當您要將欄位加入動態建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object dynamically to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>以動態方式為物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控制，建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入的欄位集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to render the buttons of the pager field on the browser.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來呈現頁面巡覽區欄位，在瀏覽器上之按鈕的階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonCssClass property to specify the CSS class to render on the browser for the buttons of the pager field.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ButtonCssClass 屬性來指定按鈕的頁面巡覽區欄位的瀏覽器上呈現的 CSS 類別。

trans-unit.source: This property will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性一律會呈現為類別屬性，不論瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the ButtonCssClass property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的瀏覽器不支援 CSS，設定 ButtonCssClass 屬性有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate 中。

trans-unit.source: The CSS class used to render the buttons of the pager field on the client.
trans-unit.target: 用來呈現頁面巡覽區欄位，用戶端上之按鈕的 CSS 類別。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string, which indicates that the ButtonCssClass property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串，表示未設定 ButtonCssClass 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the button type to display in the pager field.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在頁面巡覽區欄位中顯示的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonType property to specify which type of button is displayed in a button field.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的按鈕類型的 ButtonType 屬性會顯示在按鈕欄位。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available button types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: |Button type value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.| When ButtonType is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must set the image to display for the buttons by using the properties shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: |按鈕類型值 |描述 | |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制項。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制項。 | 當 ButtonType 設`ButtonType.Image`，您必須設定要使用下表所示的屬性按鈕顯示的影像。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| The value of the ButtonType property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>|若要顯示的第一頁按鈕影像的 URL。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>|若要顯示的前一頁按鈕影像的 URL。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>|下一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>|若要顯示的最後一頁按鈕影像的 URL。 | ButtonType 屬性的值存放在 viewstate。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ButtonType.Link" name="ButtonType.Link" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_ButtonType.Link" name="ButtonType.Link" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value for the ButtonType property is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: ButtonType 屬性的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的屬性複製<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>到指定的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method.
trans-unit.target: CopyProperties 方法是 helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object that is passed in the `newField` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來複製目前的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>物件傳入`newField`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref>來複製目前的內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>至。

trans-unit.source: Creates the user interface (UI) controls for the pager field object and adds them to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 建立使用者介面 (UI) 控制項的頁面巡覽區欄位物件，並將它們加入至指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataPagers method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create the UI controls for the pager field, such as the Previous and Next buttons.
trans-unit.target: 會使用 CreateDataPagers 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，以建立 UI 控制項的頁面巡覽區欄位，例如上一個 和 下一步 按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The container that is used to store the controls.
trans-unit.target: 用來儲存控制項的容器。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record on the page.
trans-unit.target: 第一個頁面上的索引。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 在單一頁面上的項目數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The total number of items.
trans-unit.target: 項目總數。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data pager field in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引中的資料頁面巡覽區欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A> method of the base class to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: CreateField 方法是 helper 方法，以供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>若要建立空的基底類別方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於目前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the Equals method to determine whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object is equal to the object that is specified by the `o` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Equals 方法來判斷是否目前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>物件是否等於指定的物件`o`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Equals returns `true` if the two objects contain exactly the same values for all public properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> class.
trans-unit.target: 等於傳回`true`如果兩個物件包含完全相同的值之所有的公用屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前比較的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的物件是否等於目前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>物件; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定第一頁按鈕的顯示之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the FirstPageImageUrl property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.

trans-unit.target: 此映像可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等） 所支援的瀏覽器。

trans-unit.target: 目前的雜湊碼<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Handles events that occur in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> control and performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: 處理中發生的事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref>控制，並執行適當的動作。

trans-unit.source: The HandleEvent method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: HandleEvent 方法是 helper 方法，以供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called to handle events that occur in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫它來處理中發生的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>其中一個按鈕控制項內按一下時的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The HandleEvent method examines the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: HandleEvent 方法會檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>中所包含的物件`e`參數，然後執行適當的動作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the buttons that are provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> control and the action that is performed when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出所提供的按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>控制項和按一下按鈕時執行的動作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: |Button|CommandName value|Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |First page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the first page of data.| |Previous page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the previous page of data.| |Next page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the next page of data.| |Last page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the last page of data.|
trans-unit.target: |按鈕 |CommandName 值 |動作 | |------------|-----------------------|------------| |第一頁 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|巡覽至第一頁資料。 | |上一頁 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|導覽至上一頁的資料。 | |下一頁 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|巡覽至下一頁資料。 | |最後一個頁面 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|巡覽至最後一頁資料。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels property to specify whether disabled buttons are rendered as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels 屬性來指定是否停用的按鈕會呈現為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>，來控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>

trans-unit.source: The buttons are disabled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object when the function associated with the button cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕會停用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>物件時無法執行關聯按鈕的功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you are in the first page of data, the first-page and previous-page buttons are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您在第一頁資料，第一頁和上一頁按鈕會停用。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object renders the disabled buttons by using the control type specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>物件使用所指定的控制項類型來呈現已停用的按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: It also sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property of the control to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 它也會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>控制項的屬性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control to render the disabled buttons.
trans-unit.target: 當 RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels 設`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>物件會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項轉譯已停用的按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A> property is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>屬性用來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate 中。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已停用的按鈕會呈現為<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"></xref>控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在控制項之間呈現不分行空格。

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character) are rendered between the navigation controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls 屬性來指定是否不分行空格 (HTML` `字元) 之間的導覽控制項呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: You can set RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls to `false` if you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將 RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls`false`如果您需要更充分掌控您要建立具有階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別的配置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate 中。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項; 之間呈現不分行空格否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
